full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYUD SDE SPYI'I RNAM PAR GZHAG PA RGYAS PAR BSHAD PA MKHAS GRUB DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @099B DE LTAR NA RGYUD SDE SPYI'I RNAM PAR GZHAG PA RGYAS PAR BRJOD ZIN TO,, ,,MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'O,, ,,RNAL 'BYOR ROL BA'I DGA' STON GYI SDOM TSIG NI, ,RDO RJE DRIL BU CANG TE'U BGRANG PHRENG DANG, ,LUS RGYAN KHA t'Am GA DANG BTUNG BA'I SNOD, ,BGO BA'I GOS DANG STAN LA SOGS PA GZHAN, ,RNAM PA 'DI BDUN BSHAD BYA'I DNGOS PO YIN, ,ZHES PA'O, ,BRTUL ZHUGS DRI MED GA-YANG GZHI 'CHANG ZHING LHAG BSAM @100A *, ,DAG PA'I THOR TSUGS CAN, ,MANG DU THOS PA'I BZLAS BRJOD MTHAR SON BSAM GTAN MCHOG GI ME THAB TU, ,NYON MONGS BUD SHING BSREG PA'I SBYOR BAS NYIN DANG MTSAN MO 'DA' BYED PA, ,DBEN PA'I NAGS SU LUS 'DI YONGS GTONG DRANG SRONG DE LA BLO BA DGA',, `NGUR SMRIG CHOS GOS ZUNG NGAG GIS, ,RAB BYUNG RNAMS KYI LUS MDZES KYI, ,RAB BYUNG KHYIM PA'I RTAGS 'CHANG BA, ,BSTAN PA 'JIG PA'I BRTUL ZHUGS LAGS, ,BSLAB GSUM SPRANG RTZIS GANG BA YI, ,PADMAS BSTAN PA'I CHU MTSO MDZES, ,KHRIMS 'CHAL NGUR SMRIG GOS 'CHANG BA, ,BDUD RNAMS MCHOG TU YID DGAR BGYID, ,DE LTAR RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DANG, ,BDUD KYI GNYEN GYUR GANG LAGS PA, ,RJES SU GZUNG DANG TSAR GCOD PA'I, ,PHRIN LAS THABS MKHAS LDAN PA MDZOD, ,GANG ZHIG RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB KYI, ,DGONGS DON SMRA LA NUS MED PA, ,LONGS SPYOD LDAN PA'I SKYE BO NI, ,MANG YANG BSTAN LA DGOS NUS MED, ,LEGS BSHAD 'OD BRGYA'I SNANG BA CAN, ,BSHES GNYEN NYI MA GCIG GIS KYANG, ,THUB BSTAN GLING BZHI MA LUS PA, ,CIG CAR NYID DU GSAL BAR NUS,, SHU BHAm,, ,, `SVASTI, ,PHANG BDE'I 'BYUNG GNAS RGYAL BSTAN YONGS 'DU'I LJON, ,RAB RGYAS 'GRO KUN THAR MCHOG 'BRAS BZANG LA, ,SPYOD PHYIR BKRA SHIS LHUN GRUB CHOS GRVA CHER, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED DAL 'GRO'I RGYUN 'DI SPEL,, MANGGA LAm,, ,,
